Hay dear friend

for gaming ?

Yes DirectX is compatible with all systems and all Hardware ...
Summarizing DirectX is a type of Addons Windows ..

This may be a directX download,but it will not give you 11.1. and even if it did.

it wouldn't do you any good because current gen graphics cards don't support 11.1 fully and  no games use it yet.
